name: Alpaca Goes Shopping
description:
In this timed shopping dash, you're a unicorn alpaca with only a short time before the supermarket closes. Good luck getting the items on your shopping list through the checkout in time!

Watch out for impulse buys, and stray shopping trolleys.  Keep an eye out  for power-up  star lollies.

One of the first games we ever made,  one mad week in 2018.  

By Connor Isogai , Thomas Pearson and Jayne Gale
